duties_responsibilities.duty: Build and retain a high-performing team, create a consistent environment of world-class customer service, and exceed sales plan.
Lead and model a customer-first culture across all roles, providing ongoing coaching and training to enhance individual selling skills and behaviors.
Monitor inventory management, special orders, receiving processes, layaway, mark out of stock, repairs, and ensure first-quality standards for all merchandise.

Communicate daily sales goals to all team members, monitor individual team member performance, and develop action plans for improvement through weekly performance discussions using customer reviews and mystery shops.
Ensure the store is always staffed, achieve all staffing goals, and fill open positions within 30 days.
Responsible for the store payroll, ensuring it does not exceed the monthly budget, and leading the store to achieve Total Monthly Income (TMI) Goals consistently.

education_certification.credential: Four years prior retail management experience in an apparel or specialty store environment.
Prior experience with a computerized POS system.
